Zone.BossTaunt7: Frog soup, I love it for sure!
Zone.BossTaunt8: No skill can cheat your death!

Zone.BossTaunt3: I've got loads of magic on me!
Zone.BossTaunt4: My slave tikis will deal big pain!
Zone.BossTaunt6: My magic is purely strong and evil!
Zone.BossTaunt10: Now is the time for&cr;sorcerous judgment!

Zone.BossTaunt2: All who smell the Baron know fear!
Zone.BossTaunt8: Has nobody told you my name?
Zone.BossTaunt10: Baron Digo is the name of your DOOM!

Zone.BossTaunt2: Say, how do you like pestilence?
Zone.BossTaunt6: I'm an insect god,&cr;by the by!
Zone.BossTaunt8: So glad you're coming my way!
Zone.BossTaunt9: You are tough but not enough, Frog!
Zone.BossTaunt10: At last my tiny friends will FEEEEED!

Zone.BossTaunt3: I'm calm now, but only for a second.
Zone.BossTaunt4: Pow! Even angrier than I was!
Zone.BossTaunt8: I feel the anger welling up again!
Zone.BossTaunt9: I can't take much more waiting!
We will never give up our mysteries.
Zone.BossTaunt10: Now we see how a frog DIES!

ScoreTip.text: The Reverse powerup&cr;rolls the balls in the&cr;opposite direction.
The Slowdown powerup&cr;reduces the speed of&cr;balls on the curve.
The Accuracy powerup&cr;makes your shots faster&cr;and easier to target.
The Tri-shot fires three&cr;destructive balls of doom!
The Lightning powerup&cr;destroys all balls of&cr;your target's color.
The Laser zaps balls&cr;and fruit with&cr;pinpoint accuracy.
Use the right mouse button to&cr;cancel the Laser powerup.
When changing lily pads try&cr;using the right mouse button.
Use the right mouse button to&cr;swap between ball colors.
You can jump to an empty lily pad&cr;by clicking on it.
Use the Laser powerup to trigger&cr;other powerups!
Shoot fruit for extra points&cr;and a Zuma bar boost.
Shooting through gaps increases&cr;the points you get for a match!
Beating a level without dying&cr;will earn a Perfect Level Bonus.
Beating Ace Time on a level will&cr;give you a bonus.
The Laser powerup slows time so&cr;you can make precise shots.
The Laser powerup can be used to&cr;collect fruit!
Fill the Zuma bar to stop new&cr;balls from coming.
The Accuracy powerup makes your&cr;shots faster for a short period.
You receive a Chain Bonus for&cr;each consecutive match after&cr;five in a row.
Get multiple matches in a single&cr;shot for a Combo Bonus.
Beat Adventure mode to unlock&cr;other modes!
Once you've beaten a zone,&cr;try it again in Challenge mode!

Level.NextLevelText: Oh no! Jungle Boss is on a rampage! Blast him through holes in the curve when his shield is down. But don't let the curve reach the skull!

Hint.text: You will make a fine meal!
I bet you're good and crunchy!
What goes well with toasted frog?
I'll bake you in a frog pot pie!

DeathText.line: My tongue's hanging out all like glahhhh.
My four brothers will avenge my tongue!

Level.NextLevelText: You've awakened Village Boss from his slumber! Use the lilypads to take shots at his heads when they glow. Be sure to keep the balls out of the skull!

Boss.wordbubble: Foolish Amphibian!&cr;Just try to breach&cr;my tiki defenses!

Hint.text: I cannot be beaten! I'm unbeatable!
See how strong my magics are?
I went to the best voodoo school!
Step it up, slave tikis! What do I pay you for?

DeathText.line: Ooga! With a helping of booga sauce!
My slave tikis completely flopped on the job.
Where did all my magic go?

Boss.wordbubble: Stick around!&cr;I have some putrid&cr;heads for you!

Hint.text: Who's the Baron? Me! I am!

DeathText.line: You beat me so hard I forgot my own name!
And I was really attached to it, too!
Some day, some way, I'll make you pay!

Boss.wordbubble: Too bad you're just a frog,&cr;without any method of&cr;cracking my shell!

Hint.text: I love the sound of insects in the morning!

DeathText.line: I threw every insect in the book at you!
But you exploded me in no time flat!
Beat it, Frog! Go swimming, why don't you?

Boss.wordbubble: I'm gonna stain&cr;you like a nice&cr;pair of slacks!

DeathText.line: My arm! It's broken! And it doesn't even have bones!
I really let myself down. Next time I'll be angrier.
Oh, well, have fun dying on the volcano!

Hint.text: I have no heart to care!
I am a rock, I am this island.
I am the totem of despair!

Boss.wordbubble: Welcome to Hell, Frog.&cr;I am your end.

Hint.text: The blood of the volcano awaits!

Boss.wordbubble: Let's see how you fare&cr;against your shadow!

DeathText.line: You have beaten every curve we threw at you.
And so now I reveal the final truth.
You have long thought yourself alone.
But... you are not the last of your kind.
